If you're a D_D Member hacking @ @EthereumDenver stop what you're doing and check this out.
We're supporting builders to ship at the hackathon in partnership with @fuellabs_ & @fluence_project 🫡
LFG

Jobs Team: Super excited to announce Builder Scholarships to @EthereumDenver 🎉
We love to see builders ship and for that @developerdao is partnering with @fuellabs_ and @fluence_project to send some of y'all to hack.
Applications Open →

articles.description:
RT ‎ lu—an Δ
if you exist at the infrastructure layer of a DAO, you want as lean a tech stack as is humanly possible. there’s a lot of moving parts, and a convoluted backend will inevitably translate to the member UX. this is why interoperability is important, when vetting platforms
